name: OR_CASE_REQ_DOCS
description: The OR_CASE_REQ_DOCS table contains OR management system case required documents.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of required document information in the case.

columns.name: REQ_DOC_COLL_DATE
columns.description: This column contains the date the required documents were collected.

columns.name: REQ_DOC_COLL_TIME
columns.description: This column contains the time the required documents were collected.

columns.name: REQUIRED_DOCS_ATTRIBUTE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the required documents attribute.
